solution_line_template: He needs {num_cards_needed} valentine's cards because {num_students} x {percent_students_for_cards} = <<{num_students}*{percent_students_for_cards}={num_cards_needed}>>{num_cards_needed}
He will spend ${total_cost_cards} on these because {num_cards_needed} x {cost_per_card} = <<{num_cards_needed}*{cost_per_card}={total_cost_cards}>>{total_cost_cards}
The proportion of his income spent is {proportion_spent} because {total_cost_cards} / {initial_money} = <<{total_cost_cards}/{initial_money}={proportion_spent}>>{proportion_spent}
This is {percentage_spent}% of his income because {proportion_spent} x {percent_multiplier} = <<{proportion_spent}*{percent_multiplier}={percentage_spent}>>{percentage_spent}
